We are in the midst of 2 deadly, concurrent public health emergencies: COVID-19 and the opioid crisis. Both are nationwide catastrophes that require immediate action to stem the tide of preventable death and disability. Even taking into account actions already taken, the novel coronavirus is forecast to take the lives of over 100,000 people in the United States,
